name: Red Attack (MayhemmGameDev)
description:
Hello! I am 11 years old and this is my first game that I have uploaded on itch, and my second game I have made.  I know it is pretty bad and the sprites look boring but I am a horrible drawer and did not want to use assets.  Any feedback for the game would be great! Hope you enjoy it!

Controls - WASD to move. Click to shoot. Enemies drop ammo for your gun. Look around with mouse  :)
